MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Vision.Face.Models.PersistedFace> AddFaceFromStreamAsync (this Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Vision.Face.IFaceListOperations operations, string faceListId, System.IO.Stream image, string userData = null, System.Collections.Generic.IList<int> targetFace = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = null);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Vision.Face.Models.PersistedFace> AddFaceFromStreamAsync(class Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Vision.Face.IFaceListOperations operations, string faceListId, class System.IO.Stream image, string userData, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<int32> targetFace, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

static member AddFaceFromStreamAsync : Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Vision.Face.IFaceListOperations * string * System.IO.Stream * string * System.Collections.Generic.IList<int> * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Vision.Face.Models.PersistedFace>

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
Id referencing a particular face list.
An image stream.
User-specified data about the face for any purpose. The maximum length is 1KB.

A face rectangle to specify the target face to be added to a person in the format of "targetFace=left,top,width,height". E.g. "targetFace=10,10,100,100". If there is more than one face in the image, targetFace is required to specify which face to add. No targetFace means there is only one face detected in the entire image.
The cancellation token.
Docs.summary: Add a face to a face list. The input face is specified as an image with a targetFace rectangle. It returns a persistedFaceId representing the added face, and persistedFaceId will not expire.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Vision.Face.Models.PersistedFace> AddFaceFromUrlAsync (this Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Vision.Face.IFaceListOperations operations, string faceListId, string url, string userData = null, System.Collections.Generic.IList<int> targetFace = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = null);

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
Id referencing a particular face list.
Publicly reachable URL of an image
User-specified data about the face for any purpose. The maximum length is 1KB.

A face rectangle to specify the target face to be added to a person in the format of "targetFace=left,top,width,height". E.g. "targetFace=10,10,100,100". If there is more than one face in the image, targetFace is required to specify which face to add. No targetFace means there is only one face detected in the entire image.
The cancellation token.
Docs.summary: Add a face to a face list. The input face is specified as an image with a targetFace rectangle. It returns a persistedFaceId representing the added face, and persistedFaceId will not expire.
